text: Abel Gonzalez Fernandez (July 14, 1930 - May 3, 2016) was an American actor. He was known for his role as Federal Agent William "Bill" Youngfellow on the 1959 - 1963 ABC Television series The Untouchables. Fernandez died on May 3, 2016 from lung cancer at a hospital in Whittier, California, aged 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Abel Fernandez bio from the Native American Celebrities website * Abel Fernandez at TV.com * Obituary Category:1930 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Abel Fernandez
